Plot: PROT is a patient at a mental hospital who claims to be from a far away planet. His psychiatrist tries to help him, only to begin to doubt his own explanations.
Title: K-PAX
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Jeff Bridges, Mary McCormack, Alfre Woodard
tomatoConsensus: For those who have seen One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest or Starman, K-Pax may not hold anything new. The movie works best as a showcase for Kevin Spacey and Jeff Bridges.
